author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Instructure Reports Qtrly ‍loss Per Share $0.39​
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Instructure Inc:
* INSTRUCTURE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.97 TO $1.03
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.22 TO $0.24
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $203.5 MILLION TO $209.5 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $46.8 MILLION TO $47.4 MILLION
* QTRLY ‍LOSS PER SHARE $0.39​ * QTRLY ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $‍0.27​ * QTRLY ‍REVENUE $43.8 MILLION VERSUS $31.55 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
